nodes.text: Omwati were a sentient species whose members had a crown of feathers atop their heads, spindly fingers, and beaks which clacked during speech. Shi Shu, the second of the pirate captain Eleodie Maracavanya, was a male Omwati.
The Omwati first appeared in the 1994 Legends novel Jedi Search by Kevin J. Anderson, and were brought into canon with the appearance of Shi Shu in Chuck Wendig's 2016 novel Aftermath: Life Debt.
